title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep 190 w/ Ray J and Special Guest Styles P)
itunes:title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep 190 w/ Ray J and Special Guest Styles P)
description:
Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER - In the 2nd edition of The Hangover some members of DC Family made it back, while others didn't as they're still struggling from last weeks hangover!

This week we recap our conversation with Ray J and Styles P! Check out as Mr. Lee, Boris aka BeatsNdaHood, Sunny D, Kardon (Eclipse Oil) and DC 2win 2 share some of their favorite moments from this weeks episode!

Follow:

Drink Champs

http://www.drinkchamps.com

http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

http://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps

http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

http://www.instagram.com/borischp

Sunny D

http://www.instagram.com/sunnydbet

Kardon (Eclipse Oil)

http://www.instagram.com/eclipseoils

DC 2win 2

http://www.instagram.com/dc2win2
